message: Anyone have a projector adaptor for a MacBook Pro? I speak at 11 in Cartoon 1 and would love to borrow it.
I'm trying to secure another, but probably won't be here before noon
I will need one in Cartoon 2 on Sunday at 12:30
I left 2 different mac dongles in the round room. Feel free to use them
I have one, in use now by a speaker, but catch up with me if you need one later.
